meanings.definition: (インドネシア語)集中させる、中心に置く、集める
meanings.english_definition: (Indonesian) to centralize, to focus, to concentrate

examples.sentence: Pemerintah berusaha untuk memusatkan kekuasaan di tangan presiden.
examples.translation: The government is trying to centralize power in the hands of the president.
examples.english_translation: The government is trying to centralize power in the hands of the president.

examples.sentence: Kami akan memusatkan perhatian pada masalah ini.
examples.translation: We will focus our attention on this problem.
examples.english_translation: We will focus our attention on this problem.

etymology.value: 語幹は「pusat」（中心）で、接頭辞「di-」と接尾辞「-kan」が付加された形。

verb_forms.meaning: to be centralized, to be focused

usage_notes.explanation: 「dipusatkan」は受動態の動詞であり、何かが中心に集められる、集中させられる、または中心に置かれることを意味します。能動態は「memusatkan」です。

example_sentences.sentence: Semua sumber daya harus dipusatkan untuk menyelesaikan proyek ini.
example_sentences.translation: All resources must be centralized to complete this project.

example_sentences.sentence: Perhatian harus dipusatkan pada detail-detail penting.
example_sentences.translation: Attention must be focused on the important details.
